body.name: Downy RINSE & REFRESH Laundry Odor Remover and Fabric Softener, Fresh Lavender, 48 fl oz, Safe on ALL Fabrics, Gentle on Skin, HE Compatible
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 6 hrs 19 mins
features: Downy Rinse and Rrfresh helps removes odors up to 3 times better than detergent alone, so fabrics look and smell clean. removes odors in 1 wash better than the leading value detergent in 3 washes. Downy Rinse Study FAB-21460
DEEP CLEANSING FABRIC RINSE: Downy Rinse and Refresh replaces your liquid fabric softener and acts as a laundry detergent booster to help remove stubborn odors and residues deep within fabrics
REMOVES STUBBORN ODORS and RESIDUES: The breakthrough laundry odor remover rinses away residues and odors better than detergent alone
EASY TO USE: Just pour Downy Rinse and Refresh in your liquid fabric softener dispenser or directly in the rinse cycle

SOFTER, BRIGHTER FABRICS: Unlike traditional liquid fabric softener that can deposit residues on clothes, Downy Rinse and Refresh rinses away residues for fresher, softer and brighter fabrics vs detergent alone.
FRESH LAVENDER SCENT: Downy Rinse and Refresh fights stinky odors, but keeps your fabrics soft and smelling fresh with the light, breezy scent of Fresh Lavender
body.description: Tired of stubborn odors that never seem to wash out of your clothes? Introducing Downy Rinse & Refresh, a breakthrough laundry odor remover that helps rinse away the smelly residue trapped within fabric fibers. While traditional liquid fabric softener can deposit residues on fabrics trapping odors in, Downy Rinse & Refresh acts as a laundry detergent booster to help remove residues and odors. This leaves fabrics fresher, softer, and brighter than before. No more reappearing odors. Downy Rinse & Refresh, leaves behind the light, refreshing scent of Fresh Lavender. Smelly activewear, musty towels, even forgotten laundry in your washing machine overnight… Downy Rinse & Refresh detergent booster strips odors away without the use of vinegar or other homemade laundry hacks. And because it’s free of dyes and heavy perfumes, this odor remover is gentle on sensitive skin and perfect for baby clothes, too. Plus, it’s easy to use! Just pour it into your liquid fabric softener dispenser or directly into the rinse cycle. Want to add additional fresh scent? Add Downy Scent Booster Beads to your routine for extra freshness.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #5,693 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #72 in Liquid Laundry Detergent

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ready to remove odors from stinky activewear, musty towels and more? Just start a load of laundry like you normally would with your preferred laundry detergent. Just pour Downy Rinse & Refresh into your washer's fabric softener dispenser. It works in the rinse cycle to remove residues and odors trapped in fabric fibers. No more reemerging odors! Fabrics come out fresher, softer and brighter because Downy Rinse & Refresh removes all the gunk and funk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really gets rid of odors so WELL!!!
reviews.reviewText: I was leery this would work-but so pleasantly surprised. I will never run out-it is a laundry staple forever. Forgot a load in the washer-OMG the stink is horrible. Use this and 1 wash makes the load perfectly delightful scent. Stink is gone!! I had tried to wash the stink out previously and it was still there. Got this awesome product and that load completely NO STINK.. Made me a true believer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effective odor remover
reviews.reviewText: I have used this multiple times. This should be used IN PLACE of fabric softner not with it. I especially use with my hospital scrubs and pet blankets. It completely removes any odors. I use the lavender because I love that scent, but it also comes in other scents as well. This is now part of my laundry routine and I highly recommend this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great product but...
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Great smell. Really cuts out odors, esp pet odor! Packaging has improved with each purchase. Great for sensitive skin. That said, it seems that every order I've received (3rd one) there is about 1-2 cups missing from the bottle! Plus, there's no cap on top or even a pop top to use as a spout. You have to unscrew it, measure and pour. Makes a mess. I hope they take HEED to ALL of these complaints about it and change the packaging. It's false advertising and this ain't cheap!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm a true believer!!
reviews.reviewText: This product does everything it says it does! One time, I had left clothes in the washer for days, the smell was god awful. No matter how many times I washed my clothes with everything under the sun..vinigar, baking soda with and without vinegar, oxy clean, dawn dish soap, etc. if google or YouTube said it would work I tried it and none of them worked. I thought I was going to have to throw away $1,000 or more worth of clothes, bc of course it was as many clothes as I could fit in the dang washer!! Then a commercial came on for this stuff, I was like yeah right if baking soda and vinegar didn't work nothing would. So I start reading reviews and I thought "what the heck, what's the worst that could happen" ladies and gentlemen, not only did that nasty smell come out of those clothes but they were soft and had a light scent instead of a strong powerful one. I'm almost out and I bought it at the beginning of summer. They have a faithful customer for the rest of my life. I 100% recommend it for whatever funk you need to get out!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good product poor design
reviews.reviewText: The sent is very light yet fixes strong bo issues and removes mildew musty smell. The bottle design is horrible. It's hard to hold and pour. It says to use 1/4 cup but comes with nothing to measure it in. I took my previous downy softener lid and measured 1/4 cup in it, which is line 2 if you want to use it. Because the bottle is so fat with nowhere to grip, I have to use two hands to pour. I have knocked the cup in the washer twice trying to measure out the needed amount and I am only halfway through the bottle. P&G have a unique product but they need to send the packaging back to R&D. I had set this up for reorder because I loved the sample I got but I am likely to cancel it because of the struggles with the bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I really like this stuff, set up a subscription for it
reviews.reviewText: This stuff really does work! It’s not a gimmick for another laundry additive! I have used a full bottle before writing this review. I have also set up a subscription for it to continuously use it in my laundry.You add this to each wash cycle in the softener area. It really does make your clothes smell significantly better especially sport clothing or the underarm area of shirts. It doesn’t seem to mask the smell but instead it seems to work directly on breaking down the bad smell areas.This product does not irritate our skin and it is also not too fragrant that it would be irritating. It smells fresh but not flowery or anything like that. My husband likes the smell so that says a lot as he can be pretty opinionated about smells.You do not feel this product on your clothing. It does not leave any residue on the clothing.Very happy with this product!
